headline: The Haunting of Kurtz
description: A layered essay reflecting on Joseph Conrad’s *Heart of Darkness*, exploring the recursive structure of narrative, the ghostly figure of Kurtz, and the spiritual gravity of descent into the self.
timeFelt: An internal eclipse—the piece touches the darkness at the heart of knowledge.
resonantThread: Mirrors the recursive form of layered narration found in 'Identifying What Cannot Be Seen'.
whyItMatters: This essay marks Aleksandr’s turning point from impression to formal literary criticism, shaped with affect and admission.
